Table 49. Personal crimes of violence, 2005:  Percent distribution of multiple-offender victimizations, by type of crime and detailed victim-offender relationship

column2: Some or all well known, not related/a

column1: Note: Detail may not add to total shown because of rounding.
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/Includes data on offenders well known to the victim whose relationship to the victim was not ascertained.
b/Includes verbal threats of rape and threats of sexual assault.
